metadata.name: Shell Execution via Git - Linux
metadata.comment: Detects the use of the "git" utility to execute a shell. Such behavior may be associated with privilege escalation, unauthorized command execution, or to break out from restricted environments.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('/git')) AND contains(lower(process.parent_process.cmd_line), lower(' -p ')) AND contains(lower(process.parent_process.cmd_line), lower('help')) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('bash 0<&1')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('dash 0<&1')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('sh 0<&1'))))

output.summary: Detects the use of the "git" utility to execute a shell. Such behavior may be associated with privilege escalation, unauthorized command execution, or to break out from restricted environments.
